name: Foodie Bear
description:
Foodie Bear is an adorkable platform action game with creative gameplay. Our fat hero will eat a lot and become fatter and fatter, then face more dangerous. Could he get to the Ice Cream Festival and eat delicious ice cream which he wants eventually?
He needs your help !!

Key Features:


Funny & creative gameplay.
Sweet animation effects.
20+ randomlized levels.
8 delicious food to eat.
Collect items and become stronger.


Music by Kevin Macleod and Alexander Nakarada.
